PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xAF6025^xADAA47LEVELING NOTES^7^7 ^7 ^xD02090Guide by ^xD02090animeprincess^7 ^x3F6DB3^7^xD02090https://www.twitch.tv/animeprincess https://www.youtube.com/@anime.princess^7 ^xC8C8C8
^xAF6025-----------Regex for Tarkleigh---------------------- ^xADAA47This string searches for movement speed boots and BBB BBG 3 links from the vendor
^xC8C8C8^7b-b-g|b-[bg]-b|g-b-b|nne|rint|derha|s:.+sc
^xE05030^xD02090^xAF6025------------------ACT1 ranger start-------------------^7^7^7 -Start with a Ranger, to mule Momentum, Pierce, and Sniper's mark to our Templar character. -We will need to go thru The Coast and into Tidal Island to kill Hailrake boss, for Pierce as a quest reward. -Breaking Some Eggs quest in the Mudflats will give Snipers Mark as a quest reward. ^xADAA47 Place these 3 gems in your stash and go back to character select to create a Templar. You will not have to enter queue again don't worry.^7
^xAF6025-----------------------ACT1 templar-------------------^7^7^7^7 -Favor using sceptre over wand, to enable Leapslam from Act 2 onwards
^x7070FFSpark^7 - ^x70FF70Pierce^7 - ^x7070FFAdded Lightning^7 (^x7070FF^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB-B-^7^x70FF70G^7^7)
^x7070FFFrostblink^7^7 - ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 (^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB-B^7^7) ^xADAA47[leave arcane surge at low level (right click it to disable level ups)]^7
^x7070FFFrostbomb^7 (^x7070FF^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^7) ^xADAA47[cast into packs as you frostblink thru them]^7
^x7070FF^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7
^x7070FF^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7^7 (^xE05030R^7) ^xADAA47[regen + extra damage, used for bosses]^7
^x7070FFFlame wall^7^7 (Optional) (^x7070FFB^7) ^xADAA47[used for bosses]^7
^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 ^xADAA47^7(Optional)^7 (^x7070FFB^7) ^xADAA47[used for bosses]^7^7
^xE05030^xADAA47^x7070FFClarity^7^7 (^x7070FFB^7)
^xE05030Leap slam^7^7 -^x70FF70 Momentum^7 (^xE05030R^7-^x70FF70G^7) ^xADAA47[this is our main movement skill once we get it]^7
^xD02090^xAF6025------------------------ACT2----------------------------^7^7 Favor 'Heavy Belt' for its strength implicit
^xADAA47[Bandits: Help Alira]^7
^x7070FF^x7070FFHerald of Thunder^7 (^x7070FFB^7)
^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 (^x70FF70G^7)
^xAF6025------------------------ACT3----------------------------^7^7^7 Favor Jade Amulet from Quest Reward for the dex implicit
^xADAA47[Notes: In temple of Lunaris, you unlock the prefix craft 'lightning damage to spells', which you can craft onto sceptres for more damage]^7
^xE05030^x7070FFSpark^7 - ^x70FF70Pierce^7 - ^x7070FFAdded Lightning Damage - ^xE05030Inspiration^7 (library) (^x7070FFB^7-^7^x7070FFB^7^7-^x70FF70G^7-^xE05030R^7)
^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 - ^x7070FFInnervate^7 ^x7070FF^x7070FF^7(library)^7^x7070FF ^x70FF70- Ice Bite^7^7 (library) (^x7070FFB-B-^x70FF70G^7^7)^7^xADAA47 [stand inside OOS and cast spark, in order to generate Frenzy charges and freeze enemies][we can drop Frostbomb and Flame Wall]^7^xADAA47 ^xADAA47 ^xE05030Leap slam^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 (library) (^xE05030R-^7^x70FF70G^7) ^xADAA47[Faster attacks is slightly faster than momentum. If you have space for 3 sockets, feel free to use Momentum as well as Faster Attacks for a really fast moveskill]^7
^x7070FF^x70FF70^xE05030^x7070FF^xE05030Determination^7^7 (library) ^xADAA47[drop Clarity. You should be able to fully sustain spark if you have Inspiration. If you don't have a 4L yet, keep a mana flask handy]
^x7070FF ^xAF6025------------------------ACT4----------------------------^7^7^7^7
^xADAA47You can drop Added Lightning for ^x7070FFSpell Echo^7^xADAA47 at the end of Act 4. This is an optional gemswap, which gives us SLIGHTLY MORE damage at the expense of SLIGHTLY LESS mobility (because we can't move until our second cast finishes). This is entirely personal preference. ^7 ^xAF6025------------------------ACT5----------------------------^7^7^7^7^7
^x7070FF^xAF6025^7^xE05030^x7070FFSigil of Power^7 (Used in maps later) ^xADAA47^7^xADAA47[stand inside the aoe for bosses]^7^7
^x7070FF^xAF6025------------------------ACT6----------------------------^7^7^7^7^7^7 ^xADAA47^7Cap your elemental resistances right now. Teleport to your hideout and manually craft resistances onto all open suffixes via the crafting bench. If you are dying it is due to your res not being at 75%]^7
^x70FF70Tornado^7 ^xADAA47^7(Used in maps laterl)^7 ^xADAA47[used for bossing]^7^7^7
^7 ^xAF6025------------------------ACT7---------------------------^7
^xADAA47[Notes: After Completing cruel lab and speccing into the Sovereignty passive, you should drop Herald of Thunder for Zealotry.]^7
^x7070FFZealotry^7
^xAF6025-------------------Shield Swap----------------------^7^7^7^7 If you find a strong ES based shield with good offensive stats, you can drop a sceptre and use either shield charge or leapslam for your movement skill. If you are swapping to shield charge, this opens up the option to use wands and rune daggers instead of sceptre.
^xE05030Shield Charge^7 - ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7
^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 - ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7
^xAF6025-----------------Final Links For Leveling---------------^7^7^7^7^7
^x7070FFSpark^7 - ^x7070FFSpell Echo - ^x70FF70Pierce^7 - ^xE05030Inspiration^7 ^7^x7070FF(B-B-^x70FF70G^7-^xE05030R^7^x7070FF)^7
^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 - ^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7^7 ^x7070FF^x7070FF- Innervate - ^x70FF70Ice Bite^x70FF70 ^x7070FF(B-B-B^7-^x70FF70G^7^7)^7^7
^x7070FFSigil of Power - ^x70FF70Tornado^7
^x8888FF^x7070FFFrost Shield^7^7
^x7070FF^x70FF70Snipers Mark^7
^x70FF70^xAF6025^x7070FFTempest Shield - ^x7070FFZealotry - ^xE05030Determination^7^7 ^xADAA47[Don't worry about Tempest Shield until you are far into maps. Tempest Shield requires a shield equipped, however early in maps we can use double Sceptres for more damage]
^xE05030Leap Slam^7^7 - ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 ^xADAA47[Shield Charge instead of leap slam after we add in Tempest Shield]^7
^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 - ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7
^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^xADAA47[Use on leftclick instead of move]^7
^xAF6025-----------------Skill Tree Swap into Crit---------------^7^7^7^7^7^7
^xADAA47Throughout the entire leveling process, we have specced into the ^xD02090Elemental Overload Keystone^7 ^xADAA47 This is strong and can carry us past leveling and even through early maps if we want. Remember to unspec BOTH of these points when you decide to swap to the endgame crit tree.
By the time you're doing uber lab, you should probably be swapped over. ^xADAA47 I would NOT switch before 3rd lab or before having at least a 5 link.
^xE05030!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*NOTE* When you hit maps and start capturing Pantheon Bosses, please note that if you capture Merveil for Brine King, you will NOT be able to self-chill later.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ^7
^xD02090^xFFFF77NOW THAT YOU HAVE HIT MAPS THE NEXT STEP IS IN THIS PLAYLIST, WHICH IS ORDERED FOR YOU TO WATCH CHRONOLOGICALLY.
PLEASE IGNORE THE VIDEO RELEASE DATES, AS I HAVE BEEN MAKING SPARK GUIDES FOR OVER A YEAR AND SOME CONTENT IS EVERGREEN AND DOES NOT NEED TO BE REMADE:^7^7
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGPotsSEuoQHojDFcXXlg66wxd0VZClLp
/end ^7
